info.title: CHIPS Money API - VAS Service Purchases
info.description:
APIs to assist integrators to test and integrate the VAS for Prepaid Mobile. 

# Features
*Get one or more prepaid merchants by criteria
*Get prepaid merchant by UUID
*Get one or more products
*Get product
*Get one or more purchases
*Create purchase
*Get purchase

uuid.description: The unique reference usd to identify the token request

created.description: The date and time that the token request was created

lastModified.description: The date and time that the token request was last modified

merchantType.description: Type of merchant requested, either electricity or mobile

get.description: Get one or more merchants by criteria

uuid.description: The unique reference number used to identify the toke n request

payerAccountUuid.description: The uniqe reference number used to identify the token request
